bug.short_desc: When ibus-typing-booster is active the “enter command” dialog of Gnome cannot be closed with ESC
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
When ibus-typing-booster is active and the “enter command” dialog is opened (default key binding Alt+F2), it cannot be closed with ESC again.
For other input methods like ibus-kkc, this works.
ibus-typing-booster-1.5.0-1.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-b5d93a9b45
